Marry Me at Christmas

Ano: 2017

IMDb ID: tt6791000

Classificação: 6.5

Sinopse: Organizing a Christmas wedding is a true treat for bridal-boutique owner Madeline Krug. She loves the challenge of finding the perfect dress for the bride and orchestrating an exquisite event. What Madeline didn't expect was to be swept off her feet by the bride's gorgeous brother, movie star Jonny Blake. Jonny came to the quirky town of Fool's Gold to support his sister--not to fall in love. Yet Madeline is the most extraordinary woman he's ever met. Planning the perfect wedding leads to candlelit dinners and strolls through snow-covered streets. Madeline finds the real Jonny even more captivating than her celebrity crush. Will the action star be brave enough to take on the role of a lifetime?—Happy_Evil_Dude
